Burlington.Alumni Gym (Elon University):
Alumni Gym is a 1,585-seat multi-purpose arena in Elon, North Carolina, United States. It was built in 1949 and is home to the Elon University men's and women's basketball teams and the women's volleyball team through the 2017–18 school year.
The gym was recently renovated to include new seats, lighting, video boards, locker rooms, and much more.
